title: Pelican For Back Medicated Soap 135g(set of 4)
features: Help treat the acne-prone skin on the back intensively to give your perfect back skin
Be afraid of the backless costume? Try the PELICAN specialized back acne treatment
Apply the back acne treatment for women on the skin when showering, body washing and rinsing

This is a medicated soap to treat acne-prone skin on the back intensively in 3 steps. It features a double cleansing formula made from charcoal, mud, and papain to clear up clogged pores. The double active ingredients, triclosan and dipotassium glycyrrhizate, disinfect the skin, while bentonite and glycerin cleanses the skin to a hydrating finish.
Made in Japan with the highest production and material standard
